import React from 'react'; import '../Confirmation.css'; // Import the global styles function BookingConfirmed({ bookingDetails }) { const { userName, userEmail, userPhone, Address, postalCode, serviceName, servicePrice, totalArea, discount, amount } = bookingDetails; return (

Booking Confirmed

Thank you for booking with us, {userName}!

{/* User Information */}
Name: {userName}
Email: {userEmail}
Phone: {userPhone}
{/* Service Information */}
Service Name: {serviceName}
Service Price (per m²): ${servicePrice}
Total Area (sqm): {totalArea} m²
Discount: {discount}%
Total Amount: ${amount}

We look forward to providing you with excellent service!

); } export default BookingConfirmed;
